text: The individual eventing at the 1980 Summer Olympics took place between 25 and 27 July at the Trade Unions' Equestrian Complex. The competition was split into three phases: #Dressage (25 July) #:Riders performed the dressage test. #Endurance (26 July) #:Riders tackled roads and tracks, steeplechase and cross-country portions. #Jumping (27 July) #:Riders jumped at the show jumping course. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Rider !Horse !Nationality !Dressage !Rank !Endurance !Rank
